lead_paragraph: The Advertising Club of New York named officers for 2009-10. C. Thom Gruhler, executive vice president and worldwide global account director at McCann Erickson Worldwide, part of the McCann Worldgroup unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies, was named president. He succeeds Ian Parmiter, senior vice president for integrated advertising sales marketing at the Discovery Networks, part of Discovery Communications, who becomes chairman of the club. Among other officers, Beth Ann Eason, general manager and chief operating officer at Beliefnet, becomes senior vice president; she had been vice president. And Laurel Rossi, president, Strategy Farm, becomes vice president; she had been director.
